q1: Have you watched Switzerland play in the world cup this year?
a1: Switzerland had a good run in this World Cup. They are a small country, so they need to follow the example of Iceland.
q2: Will you watch Switzerland play more often since they made the World Cup this year?
a2: No, I still think their style of play is a bit boring.
q4: Who is your favorite Swiss player?
a4: Stephan Lichtsteiner is my favorite from the Swiss team.
q5: According to this years performance what can be expected from them next time?
a5: They have a good chance if their offense is worked on.
